elements.text:
You go to your parents' home for the first time in a while and notice that your father looks a lot less healthy than you remember. Neither one of your parents mentions anything about his health. 

Here are some feelings that might happen in the moment:

texts: I feel excited to catch him up on all the new things that are going on in my life.
I'm worried about how he looks.
I feel happy to see my father.
I'm scared to lose him, but know that I can handle grief.
I feel anxious about his health, but tolerate the anxiety.
